Hello {!Lead.Name},
Your modular building quote request for {!Lead.Company}, {!Lead.Address} is very important to our team at BOXX Modular. Unfortunately, I have not yet had the pleasure of connecting with you over the phone; and that likely is because you are very busy.

Thank you for your interest in BOXX Modular, I look forward to speaking with you soon!
We are here to help!
Lynn Perugini Marketing Specialist BOXX Modular Phone: 610-680-0385 www.boxxmodular.com
